title: Cat Haus Part 2
description: Working girls aren’t supposed to mix business with pleasure... right?Hey, again. I’m Cate and I’m still a working girl, but a few things have changed around here since the start of my story. My idiot boss Gus Haus is gone and now my former john—coincidentally named John—owns the brothel where I work.What will this change mean for the future of the Cat Haus? That’s what we’d all like to know. And me personally? Well, I’m wondering how dumb it will be to mix business with pleasure, because after spending that one night with John my heart pounds every time I see him. And more, how do I feel now that servicing our hot new boss seems to be the goal of every working girl here?Whatever happens, you can be sure it’s going to be one hell of a wild ride. It always is here in the cathouse.* Words: 20,742 (approximate)
author: Cat Johnson
